body.name: Vanicream Moisturizing Skin Cream with Pump Dispenser - 16 fl oz (1 lb) - Moisturizer Formulated Without Common Irritants for Those with Sensitive Skin

features: Moisturize and soothe: Use our body cream to hydrate, restore and maintain a normal moisture level for relief from irritated, cracking or itchy skin
Ingredients for sensitive skin: Free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde releasers; this non-comedogenic skin cream won’t clog pores
Directions: Apply moisturizer as often as needed to face, hands, feet and body or as directed by a physician. Ideal for the entire family.
Dermatologist tested: Awarded Seal of Acceptance from the National Eczema Association
Please note: There are no fragrances or masking fragrances in Vanicream products, but there may be a slightly different aroma to each batch; packaging may vary
body.description: A thick, smooth moisturizing cream that helps restore and maintain a normal moisture level. Helps soothe red, irritated, cracking or itchy skin. It is as gentle as it is effective on even the most delicate skin. Ideal moisturizing formula for dry skin associated with eczema, psoriasis, ichthyosis and winter itch. Kid-friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Skin's Soulmate: A Love Letter to Vanicream
reviews.reviewText: My Dearest Vanicream,As I sit here, pen in hand, my heart overflows with gratitude for the incredible impact you've had on my skin. You, my gentle giant, have transformed my once-dry, irritated complexion into a haven of hydration and softness.From the moment our paths first crossed, I knew there was something special about you. Your thick, velvety texture, reminiscent of a luxurious whipped cream, enveloped my skin in a comforting embrace. Each application was a soothing balm, easing away the redness and irritation that had plagued me for so long.I was particularly smitten with your willingness to accompany me on my journey with tretinoin, the notorious skin-saviour known for its sometimes-harsh side effects. With you by my side, the dreaded tretinoin-induced dryness and flakiness were nowhere to be found. Instead, my skin remained supple, nourished, and free from irritation.Your effectiveness extends far beyond the realm of tretinoin-induced dryness. Whether I'm battling the harsh winter winds or the parched air of central heating, you stand as my faithful ally, replenishing my skin's moisture and restoring its natural glow.Oh, how I adore your fragrance-free nature, a gentle touch that soothes my sensitive skin without the overwhelming assault of perfumes and artificial scents. You understand that true beauty lies in simplicity and purity, and your delicate, yet effective formula embodies this philosophy perfectly.My love for you, Vanicream, knows no bounds. You are my skin's confidante, its protector, and its most ardent admirer. I will forever cherish the day we met, and I eagerly anticipate the countless days of radiant, hydrated skin that lie ahead.With all my love,A Devoted Admirer*****UPDATE*****Fool that I am, I decided to try a different night moisturizer from a very popular brand. HUGE MISTAKE. I woke up the following morning with flaky skin by my mouth and around my eyes. It made so many promises that I was temporarily wooed. That period has ended. I eighty-sixed the new cream and returned to Vanicream. Two days later, and the flakes have ceased and my barrier is in tact. LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is dermatologist recommended it's excellent for sensitive skin, no fragrance or other chemicals. Moisturizes really well. A friend asked me what I use on my skin bkz it looks so good (I'm 70) and she bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought the face wash/body wash/body cream bundle to try after loving the shampoo, conditioner and face moisturizer by this brand so much.Face wash: So amazingly gentle and luscious-feeling. You only need one pump for face and neck and it is still almost too much! Very rich but doesn't break me out. I'm coming from a very exfoliating cleanser and was worried this wouldn't be enough for my skin but it feels great. No fragrance and beautiful pearlescent color. I seem to have less redness in my face, too.Body wash: Same as above - use much less than you think you need, to start! Very lush and gentle. Suds up A LOT! Also no fragrance and same beautiful pearlescent color. Doesn't feel drying at all.Body cream: I would technically probably give this one four stars. It's JUST hydrating enough for my bone-dry skin (in summer - we'll see how it holds up in winter), and absorbs pretty quickly with no stickiness after about 20 minutes or so. The very first time I used it, I detected a slightly unpleasant smell that I cannot begin to describe. The body cream I was using before this was Bioderma Intensive Baume. It is truly unscented, hydrates amazingly well BUT leaves me sticky for hours which is quite unpleasant, hence me shopping around. I may still switch back and forth between both depending on my needs that day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Body Lotion I've Found!
reviews.reviewText: My skin in sensitive in the winter, so I went on a lotion buying spree to see what worked best.This is the Best Body Lotion I found.The moisture is long lasting, without feeling greasy. There isn't much of a smell. It is thicker and there is some white cast with it, so I wouldn't wear it on the face - but it's great for arms and legs. Keeps my skin hydrated all day without slickness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Vani cream is the best. Best for your skin, non pore clogging, clean, safe for everyone in our home. It's moisturizing but not sticky or goopy. It keeps my skin hydrated and clean and I love that. I feel good about using it. Our skin only takes 27 seconds to absorb what goes on it so I want to be sure what I use is clean for my body and this passes the test.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect lotion for winter and dry skin. The thickness protects my skin which it moisturizes. And as with all of the Vanicream products there is no scent so it is refreshing to not have issues when my hands need moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best body moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have used Vanicream for years. It is non-greasy, unscented, and does an amazing job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have Moisturizing Cream for Very Dry Sensitive Skin!
reviews.reviewText: Vanicream Moisturizing Skin Cream has been a lifesaver for my very dry sensitive skin! Incredibly creamy and moisturizing. Absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue. Very helpful in calming irritated skin. A wonderful all over body moisturizer, and fabulous for your face and neck.I love the pump feature, so easy to use. You will need to scoop the last little bit of moisturizing cream out with your fingers, but the pump feature is efficient and pumps out most of the moisturizing cream. An incredible value, too.I highly recommend this product.

Tengo tres semanas usándola y veo resultados maravillosos en mi piel con rosácea, está muchísimo menos rojiza, muy hidratada y se siente más tersa, además de que no me sacó granitos. La uso como crema de día y noche y no afecta la textura de mi maquillaje, una gota del tamaño de un frijol es suficiente para cubrir el rostro y el bote trae mucho, durará muchísimos meses a como le estoy dando el uso. Si tienes piel grasa como yo y la usas por la noche, despertarás con la cara muy grasosa, simplemente limpia tu cara como siempre y vuelve a aplicar, ya que no es comedogenica y no saca granitos.

This is a product I have ordered before, it offers complete hydration with no greasy residue…..and no perfume! Simple moisturizing as described, I shall continue using it. The bottle lasts a long time because you do not need much, use sparingly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Vanicream Moisturizing Skin Cream with Pump Dispenser has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine, and its thoughtful ingredients offer a range of benefits.The inclusion of purified water as the main ingredient ensures a lightweight and non-greasy feel upon application. This cream effortlessly absorbs into the skin, leaving it hydrated without any residue. Perfect for daily use, it keeps my skin moisturized throughout the day.The absence of common irritants such as fragrances, dyes, and lanolin makes this moisturizing cream ideal for sensitive skin. I've noticed a significant reduction in redness and dryness since incorporating it into my routine.The pump dispenser is a convenient touch, making it easy to dispense the right amount without any mess. The simplicity of the formula, coupled with the pump design, makes it an excellent choice for those seeking effective hydration without unnecessary additives.Vanicream's commitment to gentle, dermatologist-tested ingredients is evident in the results. If you're looking for a reliable and fuss-free moisturizing solution, this cream is a must-try. My skin has never felt happier!
Repaired and moisturised my extreme dry skin
